What is additional Child Care Subsidy (t.answer: The Additional Child Care Subsidy (Transition to Work) will provide support to families who are transitioning to work from income support by engaging in work, study or training activities.

What is ACCS child care?.answer: provide additional fee assistance to families and children who are genuinely disadvantaged including: children at risk of serious abuse or neglect - ACCS (child wellbeing) grandparents on income support (1.1.I.50) who are the principal carer of their grandchildren - ACCS (grandparent)
